name: Cerys-Moon-of-Fulgora
title: Cerys
author: thesixthroc
description:
Fulgora's moon of puzzles. Ancient wrecks embedded in thick ice can seemingly be repaired, including a colossal nuclear reactor that could transform the possibilities on the surface... if you can get it working.

Cerys is a complete and polished mod that does not modify the vanilla game in any way, so is easy to include in existing saves.
